intro: Arachnites luteus, commonly known as the yellow starwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its bright yellow flowers that bloom in the summer months. The plant typically grows in moist, open habitats such as meadows and wetlands. It has basal leaves that are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs. Arachnites luteus is often found in temperate regions of Europe and Asia.
